long_description: Sporty and stylish, the Kuhl Katie Cap is a great addition to your hiking and running wardrobes. Made with a comfortable blend of cotton, nylon and spandex; fabric wicks away moisture to keep skin dry and cool. Anatomically engineered for a great fit; adjustable strap in back is easy to use with just 1 hand. Orchid screen print on the side and the visor adds a feminine touch.
short_description: Sporty and stylish, the Kuhl Katie Cap is a great addition to your hiking and running wardrobes.
